thread.title_full: The Keto Casserole Recipes You've Been Looking For | The Huffington Post

author: Julie R. Thomson
title: The Keto Casserole Recipes You've Been Looking For | The Huffington Post
text:
The Keto Casserole Recipes You've Been Looking For These might be low carb, but they're fully delicious. By Julie R. Thomson 
One of the easiest ways to eat low-carb while filling up on the fats you want is with casseroles. If you’re following the keto diet (short for ketogenic), which cuts back big-time on carbohydrates, casseroles are going to be your best friend. Not only are they filling, satisfying and easy to make low carb, but they’ll provide you with loads of leftovers for the days to come.We have just the keto casserole recipes you want. From cheesy avocado egg casseroles to pizza dip casseroles, these are the recipes you need to help you eat keto ― and love it. 1 Deconstructed Pizza Casserole Get the Deconstructed Pizza Casserole recipe from Kalyn's Kitchen 2 Italian Spaghetti Squash Casserole No Bun Please Get the Italian Spaghetti Squash Casserole recipe from No Bun Please 3 Avocado Frittata With Cotija And Mozzarella Cheese Kalyns Kitchen 4 Cheesy Creamy Low-Carb Chicken Broccoli Curry Casserole Kalyns Kitchen 5 Low-Carb Sausage And Kale Mock Lasagna Kalyn's Kitchen
